languages.text: {n}Джиневри от удивления перестает злобно сверкать глазами на техножрицу.{/n} "Но Ваша Светлость, в трактатах о методах сыска и выявления истины ясно говорится, что пытка и устрашение — важнейшие элементы процедуры!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"
languages.original_text: {n}Джиневри от удивления перестает злобно сверкать глазами на техножрицу.{/n} "Но Ваша Светлость, в трактатах о методах сыска и выявления истины ясно говорится, что пытка и устрашение — важнейшие элементы процедуры!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Just-Logicarius.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Just-Logicarius.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that physical motivation is the most important element of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Just-Logicarius.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

{n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

languages.text: {n}Sorprendida, Jinevri deja de fulminar con la mirada a la tecnosacerdotisa.{/n} «¡Pero mi{mf|lord|lady}, los tratados sobre interrogatorio y extracción de la verdad estipulan claramente que la tortura y la intimidación son los componentes más importantes del procedimiento!».
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorprendida, Jinevri deja de fulminar con la mirada a la tecnosacerdotisa.{/n} «¡Pero mi{mf|lord|lady}, los tratados sobre interrogatorio y extracción de la verdad estipulan claramente que la tortura y la intimidación son los componentes más importantes del procedimiento!».

languages.text: {n}驚いたジネヴリは技術司祭を睨むのをやめた。{/n} 「しかし、陛下。尋問と真相究明に関する小冊子には、拷問と脅迫は最も重要な要素だと、はっきりと書かれています！」
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

traits.locale_text: {n}驚いたジネヴリはジャスト・ロジカリウスを睨むのをやめた。{/n} 「しかし、陛下。尋問と真相究明に関する小冊子には、拷問と脅迫は最も重要な要素だと、はっきりと書かれています！」

languages.text: {n}杰尼娃不再对技术神甫怒目而视，而是惊讶地看着你。{/n}“可是，大人，关于拷问与审讯的小册子写得很清楚——酷刑与恐吓是获取真相最重要的手段！”
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

traits.locale_text: {n}杰尼娃不再对技术神甫怒目而视，而是惊讶地看着你。{/n}“可是，大人，关于拷问与审讯的小册子写得很清楚——酷刑与恐吓是获取真相最重要的手段！”

languages.text: {n}Sichtlich überrascht wendet Jinevri den Blick von dem Techpriester ab.{/n} "Aber Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die Traktate zu Verhören und der Wahrheitsfindung besagen ausdrücklich, dass Folter und Einschüchterung die wichtigsten Elemente des Prozesses sind!"
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sichtlich überrascht wendet Jinevri den Blick von dem Techpriester ab.{/n} "Aber Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die Traktate zu Verhören und der Wahrheitsfindung besagen ausdrücklich, dass Folter und Einschüchterung die wichtigsten Elemente des Prozesses sind!"

languages.text: {n}Surprise, Jinevri cesse de dévisager la technoprêtresse.{/n} « Mais, Votre Seigneurie, tous les manuels consacrés aux interrogatoires et à l'extorsion de la vérité stipulent noir sur blanc que la torture et l'intimidation sont les meilleures armes de tout enquêteur qui se respecte ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprise, Jinevri cesse de dévisager la technoprêtresse.{/n} « Mais, Votre Seigneurie, tous les manuels consacrés aux interrogatoires et à l'extorsion de la vérité stipulent noir sur blanc que la torture et l'intimidation sont les meilleures armes de tout enquêteur qui se respecte ! »

languages.text: {n}Şaşkına dönen Jinevri, Tekno Rahip'e bakmayı kesiyor.{/n} "Fakat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri; sorgu ve hakikat edinimi kitapçıklarının açıkça belirttiği üzere işkence ile göz korkutma, bu sürecin en önemli ögeleridir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised, Jinevri breaks off from glaring at the Tech-Priest.{/n} "But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the tracts on interrogation and truth extraction clearly state that torture and intimidation are the most important elements of the process!"
